description: Google Documents A to Z is a course designed to help anyone who uses Google Documents, through their Gmail account or a Google Applications domain, become an expert! Although useful for anyone wanting to learn Google Documents, this course focuses on educators by leading the learner through the creation of a lesson plan that uses many of the great tools found within Google Documents. Each step is broken down into individual tools found in Google Documents and Google Drive, and explores them in about 2 hours. If you are new to Google Documents, or if you struggle with it, this is the course for you!
title: Google Documents A to Z
